information: Designed and developed responsive websites for diverse clients, ensuring optimal performance across devices. Successfully implemented custom features and functionalities tailored to client needs, leading to increased user engagement. Managed end-to-end project lifecycles, from initial concept through to deployment, while consistently meeting deadlines and exceeding client expectations.

In this volunteering job, I stepped out of my comfort zone and dabbled in some React. Everyone had a task at hand, mine mainly was several parts of the Front-End. It was a pleasant experience working with the team!
